title: Would the Global Skillshots mode work in league of legends?

embed.description: Steam Workshop: Dota 2. Feature: Global skills & items Recommended heroes for new players: Pudge, Sand King, Mirana, Ember Spirit, Zeus, Queen of Pain Introduction: 7.01 version released! Have fun and try different her

body:
Just wondering if a mode like this would work in league of legends.
It would probably have the same issues that URF had that some champs could abuse the mode so it would have to be All random.

replies.body: league skillshots are coded differently to dota skillshots so i don't think it would be possible, not to mention it would be very resource intensive and might cause bugs so I doubt riot will consider it.
They could just limit the mode to certain champs like the blood moon mode?
